Posted By: Brian McQueen

Nice looking Snodgrass (catching variation) available.  No wrinkling, centering is solid, corners are mostly sharp and the Polar Bear back is very clean and entirely damage free.  Asking $110 delivered for the card.

Thanks in advance,
